name: Ganbare Goemon: Hijutsu! Sansuu Juku
summary: Ganbare Goemon: Hijutsu! Sansuu Juku is a quiz video game released for mobile phones. It was developed and published by Konami Mobile and released on November 14, 2002 in Japanese markets. It is the first video game in the Ganbare Goemon: Tsuukai Game Apli series.
